### Fallecidos  durante los  primeros 90 dias

```{r}
#remotes::install_github("joachim-gassen/tidycovid19")

library(tidycovid19)

merged <- download_merged_data(cached = TRUE, silent = TRUE)
plot_covid19_spread(
  merged, highlight = c("ITA", "ESP", "GBR", "FRA", "DEU", "USA", "BRA", "MEX","COL"),
  intervention = "lockdown"
)
```

```{r}
plot_covid19_stripes(
  type = "confirmed", 
  countries = c("ITA", "ESP", "FRA", "GBR", "DEU", "USA", "BRA", "MEX","COL"),
  sort_countries = "countries"
)
```
